10

Two Connecticut boys, grandmother found dead

Police said a two-year-old and six-month-old were taken from their daycare by their grandmother. All three were found dead in a parked car last night. (8:47 a.m.)

Sex abuse suit at Beverly school hushed

Rowley's Curtis H. Bryant was accused of sexual abuse while teaching at the Landmark School in Beverly. He was forced out and the school quietly settled the suit.
